Class ExpenseMenuView

java.lang.Object
ExpenseMenuView
public class ExpenseMenuView extends Object
A class responsible for providing a menu-based user interface to manage expenses for a logged-in user. It supports adding, viewing, updating, and deleting expenses through console input.
Author:
Omar Sayed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ExpenseMenuView(ExpenseController controller, User loggedInUser)
    Constructs the menu view with an associated controller and logged-in user.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addExpense()
    Prompts the user to input new expense details and adds it to the system.
    void
    deleteExpense()
    Prompts the user to select an expense to delete.
    void
    updateExpense()
    Prompts the user to select and update an existing expense.
    void
    viewExpenses()
    Displays all expenses for the currently logged-in user.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • ExpenseMenuView

      public ExpenseMenuView(ExpenseController controller, User loggedInUser)
      Constructs the menu view with an associated controller and logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller handling business logic for expenses
      loggedInUser - the currently logged-in user
